list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small, fast warship, especially one equipped for a defensive role against submarines and aircraft.
a person or thing that destroys something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this starfish has a bad reputation as a destroyer of coral reefs
